Members.Name: Doctor Heal
Members.Superpower: Advanced medical knowledge > can diagnose and heal injuries and illnesses at an accelerated rate.
Members.Background: A brilliant doctor who discovered a way to use his extensive medical knowledge to rapidly heal others.

Members.Name: TechWiz
Members.Superpower: Technological manipulation > can interface with and control any electronic device with his mind.
Members.Background: A computer engineer who gained the ability to mentally interface with technology after a lab accident.

Members.Name: Professor Mind
Members.Superpower: Superintelligence > has an incredibly high IQ and can solve complex problems in seconds.
Members.Background: A university professor whose experiments on brain enhancement resulted in unparalleled intelligence.

Members.Name: Detective Keen
Members.Superpower: Enhanced senses > has heightened senses of sight, smell, hearing, and touch, making her an exceptional detective.
Members.Background: A seasoned detective who developed super senses after a mysterious encounter during an investigation.

Members.Name: Athlete Ace
Members.Superpower: Peak physical condition > possesses superhuman strength, speed, agility, and endurance.
Members.Background: A world-class athlete who achieved peak physical condition through intense training and a secret experimental program.
